DOC.brief_summary: This study research existance actual bioequivalence Diltiazem 60 Mg Tablets As Tilazem 60® Made Pfizer , S.A. DE C.V. , Versus Angiotrofin® 60 Mg Made Amstrong Laboratorios De Mexico , S.A. DE C.V .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Of Diltiazem In 60 Mg Tablets As Tilazem 60® Made Pfizer , S.A. De C.V. , Versus Angiotrofin® 60 Mg Made Amstrong Laboratorios De Mexico , S.A. De C.V .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Both gender Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ± 10 % variation ideal weight ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen
